ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: W.S., S.F., T.F., S.Q., A.D., J.P., A.C., and J.O. were funded by the Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research and the Silverstein Foundation for Parkinson's with GBA (Grant 16229 to J.O.). S.F. was funded by a Liggins Institute Doctoral Scholarship. A.C. received grant funding from the Australian government. O.G., T.P., T.A., and M.K. were supported by the Jim and Mary Carney Charitable Trust (Whangarei, New Zealand), The McGee Fellowship (University of Otago, Christchurch), The Helen Poole and Ian McDonald Memorial Summer Studentship (Canterbury Medical Research Foundation, Christchurch, New Zealand), and The Health Research Council and Lottery Health Research (New Zealand).
